attributes.action: Reduce Tax to the average Britian and increase Taxes to the rich to improve quality of life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Doing this will curb anti-social behaviour by relieving the stress caused by money on low-income families/average earning families, which is the main cause of young people commiting crimes. 

This is the fairest way to tax, and considering how high tax is at present and how much cost this accounts for in real terms from the average salary makes the current tax system a joke.
